message: Hello Bob, I have a great product for you! I'm willing to let you have it for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can come to an agreement for $120.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $125 as my offer for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $130.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. My final offer for the product is $127.
I'm not willing to go below $135, Bob. I'll meet you in the middle at $131.50
Hello Alice, I appreciate your effort to meet halfway. My counteroffer for the product is $130.
I'm not going to go any lower, Bob. I'll give you a slight concession, but I need $132.50 for the product.
Hello Alice, I've done my best to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
